pageProduct.name: Skin Doctors Collagen Renew Extreme Collagen Filler DuoPearl Serum 20ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Clinically proven 'needle-free' collagen filler doubles collagen density for plumper looking skin in 84 days. Powered by the latest Microfluidics Pearl Technology, Skin Doctors Collagen Renew DuoPearl Serum offers a plumping serum for firm, fit and youthful looking skin.

Our golden collagen filling pearls are so powerful they improve the appearance of wrinkles by 138%.

Our white Probiotic Microbiome protecting pearls help balance and protect the skin from external ageing factors.

Both pearls are encapsulated and protected in a super-hydrating hyaluronic acid serum that is activated on skin for maximum impact and results.

General Information

Skin Doctors Collagen Renew DuoPearl Serum is a clinically proven, 'needle-free' collagen filler that doubles collagen density for plumper looking skin in 84 days.

Powered by the latest Microfluidics Pearl Technology, Skin Doctors CollagenRenew offers a breakthrough needle-free collagen plumping serum for firm, fit, and youthful looking skin. Suspended in a nourishing hyaluronic gel are Liftonin-Xpert™ concentrated Pearls. 

Clinically proven Liftonin-Xpert™ is a collagen filler and booster so powerful it helps strengthen the architectural structure of the epidermis. Collagen and elastic fibres are responsible for the skin's smooth and youthful texture. Our collagen-boosting Pearls work in perfect synergy with the Probiotic Pearl to help balance the skin.

Clinically proven, skin collagen density doubles, the face lifts and smooths to visibly regain new firmness, structure and elasticity including:
• the appearance of wrinkles improves by 138%
• skin texture improves by 137%

Size: 20mL

Warnings

Always patch test 24 hours within intended area before use, if irritation occurs discontinue use. Do not use on broken or irritated skin. Avoid contact with eyes, in the event of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water. Keep away from children.

Ingredients

Aqua, Glycerin, Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Lactobacillus Ferment, Porphyridium Cruentum Extract, Saccharide Isomerate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polysorbate-20, Triethanolamine, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer, Agar, Calcium Alginate, Gellan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Maltodextrin, Pullulan, Citric Acid, Fragrance, Sodium Citrate , CI 77019, CI 77891, CI 77491.

Directions

1. Cleanse face and neck
2. Apply Skin Doctors Collagen Renew DuoPearl Serum over face and neck, massage in
3. Apply other Skin Doctors treatment products
4. Complete with Skin Doctors Supermoist™ to protect the skin
5. Use morning and night for best results

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.
